conbody.p: With version 2.7.1.1, the JDBC Multitable Consumer origin can now read from views in addition to tables. The origin now reads from all tables and all views that are included in the defined table configurations.

When upgrading pipelines that contain a JDBC Multitable Consumer origin from versions earlier than 2.7.1.1, review the table configurations to determine if any views are included. If a table configuration includes views that you do not want to read, simply exclude them from the configuration.
